content: tcm390: Extremely active contributor who merged 42 PRs this month, with significant work on Twitter integration fixes (#4192, #4167, #4165), Telegram community management (#4134, +7976/-2422 lines), and OpenAI TTS implementation (#4255, #4259). Fixed numerous critical bugs across the platform, including Discord actions (#4265, #4264), transcription issues (#4236), and agent interaction problems (#4331, #4337), while also enhancing the GUI with several improvements (#4300, #4358). Consistently active on 22 out of 30 days, tcm390 also identified and resolved 7 issues they created themselves, and provided 34 code reviews (22 approvals) to support other contributors.
